inscription:
Signature, Date, Edition, Plaque, Inscription

Printed inscription on brass plate, verso: [\"THE PANCAKE EATER\" / Copyright: Red Grooms, 1981 / Co-published by Brooke Alexander, Inc. and Marlborough Gallery, Inc. New York / Produced by Vermillion Editions, Ltd., Minneapolis, Minnesota / This is copy: AP 1/9]
medium: Three-dimensional color lithograph, screenprint, and Radiance gold powder on Arches Cover paper, with Mylar, cutouts, and retractable window shade with string; glued and assembled in a Plexiglas box
signed: Signed, dated LR, in red pencil: [Red Grooms \'81]
title: The Pancake Eater
